name: multi_variable_15
requirements: Manage the state of a system with 15 variables. Each variable has a specific type and initial value. The system should be able to perform operations on the variables and update their values. The system should be able to persist the variables across multiple turns.

turns.query: I'm adding a new book to our catalog. Title is 'Python Guide' by John Smith, published by TechBooks in 2023. It has 450 pages, first edition, priced at $49.99. Rating is 4.5 stars, weighs 1.2kg. It's available, not a bestseller yet, but has an ebook version. Genres are programming and education. Chapters include Intro, Basics, and Advanced. ISBN is 123-456 and it's in English.

We're releasing a second edition! Append ' 2nd Edition' to the title, set publisher to 'TechBooks Pro'. Set year to 2024, pages to 550, edition to 2. Set price to $59.99, rating to 4.7, weight to 1.4. Set bestseller to true. Append 'reference' to genres. Append 'Expert' to chapters. Add 'updated': true to info while keeping existing isbn and language.
Holiday sale time! Prepend '[SALE] ' to the title. Set price to 20% off the current price. Append 'sale' to genres. Add 'discount': 0.2 to info while keeping existing entries.

Creating a new online course called 'Web Development' by Jane Doe on the LearnOnline platform. Year 2024, no page count since it's video-based, first edition. Price is $199, no ratings yet, no physical weight. It's available, not a bestseller, no ebook. Genres: web, frontend, backend. No chapters yet. Info shows 40 hours of content at beginner level.

The course is gaining traction! Set pages to 10 (lesson count). Set rating to 4.8 and bestseller to true. Set chapters to ['HTML', 'CSS', 'JavaScript']. Add 'students': 1000 to info while keeping existing hours and level.

Course is now complete! Append ' [COMPLETE]' to the title. Set pages to 20, edition to 2, price to $249. Set rating to 4.9, ebook to true. Append 'fullstack' to genres. Append 'React' and 'Node' to chapters. Add 'complete': true to info while keeping existing entries.

Starting a new podcast called 'Code Talk' hosted by Mike Chen on PodNetwork. Started in 2023, 10 episodes so far (use pages for episode count), first edition. It's free so price is $0, rating 4.2, no physical weight. Available, not a bestseller, not an ebook. Genres: tech, interviews, coding. Chapter list: Ep1 through Ep5 for featured episodes. Info: platform 'Spotify', duration_avg 45.

The podcast is going premium! Set publisher to 'PodNetwork Pro', year to 2024, pages to 50 (episodes), edition to 2. Set price to $4.99, rating to 4.6. Set bestseller to true, ebook to true. We're expanding into a network! Set title to 'Code Talk Network', author to 'Mike Chen & Team'. Set pages to 100 (episodes), edition to 3, price to $9.99. Set rating to 4.9. Append 'video' to genres.
